desc: Lota is a free online EPUB reader, support all platforms (Web, Windows, Linux, MacOS, Android, iOS). Read multiple books at the same time. Read seamlessly between different devices.

0.title: Free
0.desc: All of Lota's features are free except for cloud storage.

1.title: Grid layout
1.desc: Lota supports (horizontal) grid layout, which allows you to read multiple books at the same time.

2.title: Cloud storage
2.desc: Store your books, notes, reading progress and even other data in the cloud. Lota will sync them between your devices.

0.a: Sorry, we do not support refunds.

1.a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time, after which we will not charge you again until you resume your subscription manually.

2.q: Will the data saved in the cloud be deleted after I cancel my subscription?
2.a: No, but you will not be able to synchronize data.

0.a: Your data is stored locally in your browser. If you upload a book, there will be a remote copy in the cloud.

1.a: For local data, clear the browser cache. For remote data, select and delete the book you want to clear (this will also clear the local one).
